abstract: Shax Riegler's book provides fuel for my obsession with dishes (which is kept in check by my small apartment's limited storage space).
snippet: Shax Riegler's book provides fuel for my obsession with dishes (which is kept in check by my small apartment's limited storage space).
lead_paragraph: This season has produced a bumper crop of design books, three of which cover the spectrum from the glamorous to the practical. The second in our three-part installment.
